main.name: Syed Hadi
main.description: Hi, i am a dedicated and result-oriented individual with +4 years of experience in IT Industry. Capable of handling deadlines and delivering diverse projects. Expertise in Software Engineering and Project Supervision, have worked with both National and International corporations on delivering state of the art products that are now being used by millions of customers. Web3 & AI enthusiast, always ready to take on new challenges !
main.bio: I have been part of the team that has created the largest Agri-tech platform, with millions of users. Working on several Web3 and AI driven products with numerous International clients. Implemented Fin-tech software products with international organization (GSMA) to improve loan systems. Sharpened my skills in programming frameworks like (React | Next | Node) and used them in projects. Utilizing technologies like (LangChain | TensorFlow) to integrate data driven solutions. Programming of internal and external composite portals for (Jazz | Telenor | Ufone) as VAS services. Experienced corporate working structures, time management and team building.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science - BS, Computer Science

work.title: Software Engineering Manager
work.description:
- Working on several Web3 and AI driven products with numerous International clients 
 Utilizing technologies like (LangChain | TensorFlow) to integrate data driven solutions - Maintaining teams collaboration and ensuring timely delivery of on going projects - Building and maintaining multiple business relations with clients and corporations - Gathering requirements and ensuring project scope with several stakeholders -

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: - I have been part of the dev team that has created the largest Agri-tech platform (BKK), with millions of users - Worked on Fin-tech software products with international organization (GSMA) to improve loan systems - Sharpened my skills in programming frameworks like (React / Next / Node) and used them in projects - Programming of internal and external composite portals for (Jazz / Telenor / Ufone) as VAS services - Used tools and technologies (GitHub / AWS / Azure) for optimizing work-flow and collaborations -

work.title: Solution Specialist
work.description: - Took up the challenge of coming up with new propositions and implementation of business solutions - Acquired the skills needed to conceptualize and execute the projects in the most ideal way - Made thorough project plans and documented the progress of each individual task - Established the technology and cloud stack while maintaining the product scope - Completed, presented and defended the finalized solution successfully -

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: - Started my career of working for startups, gaining insights of Tech Industry - Learned and implemented front-end development technologies as per requested - Obtained skills on how to become a team player and deliver the right products on time - Came up with unique designs, implemented and deployed them after gathering requirements - Made projects up and running for the customers, resolved bugs and maintained them to perfection -
